valence.build package¶

Submodules¶

valence.build.agilentgcms module¶

Read GCMS files produced by Agilent

class valence.build.agilentgcms.AgilentGcms(dir_list, dir_keys=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Read GCMS files from one or more Agilent .D folders into a collection of pandas.DataFrame.

Parameters:
  • dir_list (list(str)) – Paths to Agilent .D folders.
  • dir_keys (list(str)) – Optional. Provide custom names for the .D folders. If omitted, the folders’ names are used.
datams¶

pandas.DataFrame – DATA.MS data extracted from .D folders.

classmethod from_dir(agilent_dir)[source]¶

Initialize AgilentGcms from single Agilent .D folder.

Parameters:agilent_dir (str) – Path to Agilent .D folder.
Returns:AgilentGcms object constructed from single Agilent .D folder
Return type:obj
classmethod from_root(root_dir)[source]¶

Initialize AgilentGcms from root folder containing at least one Agilent .D folder.

Parameters:root_dir (str) – Path to folder containing at least one Agilent .D folder.
Returns:AgilentGcms object constructed from a folder containing one or more Agilent .D folders
Return type:obj
keys¶

list(str) – Keys representing .D folder names.

results_fid¶

pandas.DataFrame – RESULTS.CSV fid data from .D folders

results_lib¶

pandas.DataFrame – RESULTS.CSV lib data from .D folders

results_tic¶

pandas.DataFrame – RESULTS.CSV tic data from all .D folders

class valence.build.agilentgcms.AgilentGcmsTableBase(col_keys, reader, file_path)[source]¶
